puzzle.title: Dude
puzzle.hint: Did you notice that the number three appears frequently in this puzzle? The variants on "dude" even occur in multiples of three.
Is there anything three-like on the code sheet?
Ternary looks good, but which "dude" is which?
Use the order of the words in the title for your numeric ordering: 0=dewd, 1=duuuuude, 2=dude. Each grouping of three words in the conversation is a new ternary letter.
The solution is Barley Mill Pub
